en.awaitingClarificationTitle: You need to provide more information or documents
en.awaitingClarificationReviewOfCase: Following a review of your case, the court is not yet satisfied that you are entitled to a decree of divorce.
en.awaitingClarificationNotSatisfied: You can download and keep the court’s full Refusal Order ({{ refusalOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).
en.awaitingClarificationDoNext: What you need to do next
en.awaitingClarificationProvideResponse: You need to provide a response to the court’s feedback before your application can proceed.
en.awaitingClarificationSubmitDocuments: You will be able to submit additional documents online or by sending the original paper copies by post.
